attributes.action: ban low floor buses and re-introduce step entry buses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the introduction of low floor buses increases, bus drivers are getting more and more grief from mothers with pushchairs/buggys demanding to use the spaces and getting abusive to bus drivers when there is no space.  It has even been witnessed that these mothers are "evicting" wheelchair users for whom low floor buses were originally designed for.
